text: ~I’m looking for a HubSpot Dev to be on-call/backup for my agency while I’m on medical leave. 3 weeks December 21- Jan 7th.  I’m looking for someone who can fix things in case of emergency. Must know themeing, workflows, sections, layout, email, lists, and content staging.  English or Spanish speaking. We’re based in central US.  Must be able to respond same day to requests.  Send me a DM. Only looking for 1 person.~   I found someone.
